segments.text: What did you buy at the market ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bought some special local products .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You seem to have bought the whole market !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I really wanted to do so . I love those handicrafts , especially the paper-cut .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Paper-cuts are all hand-made . Let me see the paper-cuts you bought . They are all animals .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Aren't animals the main content of Chinese paper-cuts ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Animals , especially Chinese zodiac , are the most common theme in paper-cuts . But there are other themes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I will buy some tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you want to buy so much ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I want to send them to my friends .
segments.speaker: S2
